channel.title: DeviousPK Check us out!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://fc08.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2012/337/6/8/6852020154df27f6476556772c6f106a-d5mzq65.png[/img] ______________________________________ About us DeviousPK is the #1 PK server. Friendly staff are there to help you around the clock and a welcoming community to play with, this server suits everyone!
______________________________________ Quick Links [url=http://deviouspk.com/phpBB3/index.php]DeviousPk | Forums[/url] [url=http://deviouspk.net/]DeviousPk | Webclient[/url] [url=http://deviouspk.com/page/vote]DeviousPk | Vote[/url] [url=http://deviouspk.com/page/highscores] DeviousPk | Highscores[/url] ______________________________________ Media: [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CWpXucwT6jQ&list=UUL6ZbwTOokZbv3jNyc4C95Q]DeviousPK / Quick Hybriddin' Sesh / Rudra27[/url] [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cjBKXosdj-I&list=UU-c_y4wCfB7Z-pINh5qTkIg]DeviousPk | Drop Party 50+ Players | Newton[/url] ______________________________________ Screenshots: Donator Shop #1 [img]http://s14.postimg.org/q4pyo135d/Screen_shot_2014_04_04_at_4_30_34_PM.png[/img] Donator Shop #2 [img]http://s7.postimg.org/qhr8kwei3/Screen_shot_2014_04_04_at_4_31_02_PM.png[/img] Honor Shop (Not Fully finished we are adding more awesome weapons and armor! ) [img]http://s27.postimg.org/9xghs1mxv/Screen_shot_2014_04_04_at_4_34_34_PM.png[/img] DeviousPK Highscores [img]http://s11.postimg.org/8vvrtcz6b/Screen_shot_2014_04_04_at_4_42_43_PM.png[/img] Photo Clip [img]http://www.runelocus.com/images/server_uploads/38281_43248.png[/img] Working GodWars [img]http://s18.postimg.org/y0r8rve2h/Screen_shot_2014_04_04_at_4_46_44_PM.png[/img] Gambler at ::home [img]http://s29.postimg.org/mcttp67nr/Screen_shot_2014_04_04_at_4_48_23_PM.png[/img] Spawn Tabs (For Beginners) [img]http://s24.postimg.org/aic47vjqd/Screen_shot_2014_04_04_at_4_50_17_PM.png[/img] Client Settings [img]http://s8.postimg.org/ma1s0jxgl/Screen_shot_2014_04_04_at_4_53_52_PM.png[/img] Working Torva / Special Primal Longsword that is located in Donator shop #2 [img]http://s3.postimg.org/yz668urdv/Screen_shot_2014_04_04_at_4_58_03_PM.png[/img] Working Pernix / Special Primal Battleaxe that is located in Donator shop #2 [img]http://s24.postimg.org/hw5ac27xh/Screen_shot_2014_04_04_at_4_59_49_PM.png[/img] Working Virtus / Special Eagle-eye Kite-shield that is located in Donator Shop #1 [img]http://s16.postimg.org/val15hw3p/Screen_shot_2014_04_04_at_5_01_12_PM.png[/img] 23 working skills Soon to be added with Dungeonerring & Summoning [img]http://s28.postimg.org/50rs2qj2l/Screen_shot_2014_04_04_at_5_03_41_PM.png[/img] So come join DeviousPk and Join the Reality of RSPS [img]http://www.runelocus.com/images/server_uploads/38281_43159.png[/img]
____________________________________
Unique Features Perfect combat, with great switches for Hybrids. Working ::max to get yourself level 126 straight away. Instant Pking upon login. Spawn commands added. 24/7 Uptime, with no lagg Bonus XP in a special skill, skill is different after every 48 Hours or after server reset PK server with Skilling for more options obtaining items 23 working skills, including summoning Fully working prayers and spells including turmoil Automated voting and donating system. Gain PK points by doing trivia, voting, skilling and killing other players Honor Points added -> BUY NEX HELMS. Added colored yells for Donators and Super Donators PvP rating system added. An amazing Pvp rating System that will give you points at the end of the day based on your rating. Voting shop at home with great rewards 2 Donator shops located at home. Active Forums. Weekly events with huge prizes to win. Active sociall media (youtube, facebook, twitter). Bosses ( Godwars Dungeon ). All items working such as Claws and Nex Very friendly/active staff to help you Gambler Located at home New Custom Donatorsplace also added ( With Gambler at the island ) _____________________________________ Come and play at www.deviouspk.com today! [img]http://images.cooltext.com/3686559.png[/img] [img]http://images.cooltext.com/3686562.png[/img][/center]

item.title: DeviousPK Check us out!
item.dc:creator: @ProblemDevious ProblemDevious
item.description:
@ProblemDevious wrote:

[center]

About us
DeviousPK is the #1 PK server. Friendly staff are there to help you around the clock and a welcoming community to play with, this server suits everyone!

Quick Links
DeviousPk | Forums
DeviousPk | Webclient
DeviousPk | Vote
DeviousPk | Highscores

Media:
DeviousPK / Quick Hybriddinâ€™ Sesh / Rudra27
DeviousPk | Drop Party 50+ Players | Newton

Screenshots:
Donator Shop #1

Donator Shop #2

Honor Shop (Not Fully finished we are adding more awesome weapons and armor! )

DeviousPK Highscores

Photo Clip

Working GodWars

Gambler at ::home

Spawn Tabs (For Beginners)

Client Settings

Working Torva / Special Primal Longsword that is located in Donator shop #2

Working Pernix / Special Primal Battleaxe that is located in Donator shop #2

Working Virtus / Special Eagle-eye Kite-shield that is located in Donator Shop #1

23 working skills Soon to be added with Dungeonerring & Summoning

So come join DeviousPk and Join the Reality of RSPS

Unique Features
Perfect combat, with great switches for Hybrids.
Working ::max to get yourself level 126 straight away.
Instant Pking upon login.
Spawn commands added.
24/7 Uptime, with no lagg
Bonus XP in a special skill, skill is different after every 48 Hours or after server reset
PK server with Skilling for more options obtaining items
23 working skills, including summoning
Fully working prayers and spells including turmoil
Automated voting and donating system.
Gain PK points by doing trivia, voting, skilling and killing other players
Honor Points added -> BUY NEX HELMS.
Added colored yells for Donators and Super Donators
PvP rating system added.
An amazing Pvp rating System that will give you points at the end of the day based on your rating.
Voting shop at home with great rewards
2 Donator shops located at home.
Active Forums.
Weekly events with huge prizes to win.
Active sociall media (youtube, facebook, twitter).
Bosses ( Godwars Dungeon ).
All items working such as Claws and Nex
Very friendly/active staff to help you
Gambler Located at home
New Custom Donatorsplace also added ( With Gambler at the island )

Come and play at www.deviouspk.com today!

[/center]
